detail_desc: Sports tights in cotton jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short legs. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short legs. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with running tights in jersey. Elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative lace trims, and long raglan sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and cuffs.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative lace trims, and long raglan sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and cuffs.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative lace trims, and long raglan sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and cuffs.

Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck that has a small opening and decorative knot at the front. Smocked seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.

Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck that has a small opening and decorative knot at the front. Smocked seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.

Long shirt in an airy, striped viscose weave with a collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim, and a scalloped lace trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with flounces, a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in satin with a V-neck front and back, a decorative metal ring at the shoulders and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the top.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a soft weave with concealed buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pleats for extra width at the hem. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with gentle gathers and buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Knee-length shirt dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled plumeti cotton weave with a V-neck and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and a flared skirt with inset lace trims. Lined with a short dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Calf-length dress in a plumeti weave with a V-neck, wrapover top with a safety button and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short wrap dress in soft, patterned satin with short, wide sleeves, and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Buttons at the sides, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Two T-shirts in premium cotton jersey.
Two T-shirts in premium cotton jersey.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton. Jumper with a round neckline, buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Swim top with a print motif and contrasting colour sections at the sides. Stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Swim top with a print motif and contrasting colour sections at the sides. Stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Swim top with a print motif and contrasting colour sections at the sides. Stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Fully lined bikini top with lacing at the front, padded cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.

Quilted jacket designed for a small dog. Woven fabric with a soft faux fur collar, hook and loop fastening at the neck and a hook and loop fastening with a reflective detail underneath. Fleece lining.

Maxi dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Long-sleeved, striped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sleeveless lace top with a small, scalloped stand-up collar, an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise details. Smocking with a small frill trim around the neckline, a V-shaped opening at the front with scalloped edges, and short, wide raglan sleeves.
Long, sleeveless dress in chiffon crêpe with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with beaded and sequined embroidery at the front. Lined.
Elf hat in fleece with a faux fur pompom and ears at the sides.
Fitted, knee-length lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist and a scalloped hem. Lined.
